name: py-mg-rast-tools

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Repository of scripts and libraries for using the MG-RAST API and MG-
RAST data.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-exporter-tiny
dependencies.description:
An exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core
dependencies

dependencies.name: perl-libwww-perl
dependencies.description:
The libwww-perl collection is a set of Perl modules which provides a
simple and consistent application programming interface to the World-
Wide Web. The main focus of the library is to provide classes and
functions that allow you to write WWW clients.

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-poster
dependencies.description: Streaming HTTP uploads and multipart/form-data encoding.

dependencies.name: py-prettytable
dependencies.description:
PrettyTable is a simple Python library designed to make it quick and
easy to represent tabular data in visually appealing ASCII tables.

dependencies.name: py-requests-toolbelt
dependencies.description:
A toolbelt of useful classes and functions to be used with python-
requests

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependencies.name: r-matr
dependencies.description:
Metagenomics Analysis Tools. Package matR (Metagenomics Analysis Tools
for R) is an analysis client for the MG-RAST metagenome annotation
engine, part of the US Department of Energy (DOE) Systems Biology
Knowledge Base (KBase). Customized analysis and visualization tools
securely access remote data and metadata within the popular open source
R language and environment for statistical computing.

dependencies.name: shocklibs
dependencies.description: The lib for shock: An object store for scientific data.
